cause.description:
Habitat for Humanity International is a nonprofit, ecumenical Christian housing ministry. HFHI seeks to eliminate poverty housing and homelessness from the world, and to make decent shelter a matter of conscience and action.
1. Work in partnership with God and people everywhere
2. Develop simple affordable housing for people in need
3. Empower people to grow into all that God intended
cause.mission: provide funding for an organization that makes the dream of a home a reality.
cause.name: Maumee Valley Habitat for Humanity
